errors.error_description: Installation command specifies unnecessary and potentially conflicting dependency versions that are not required for CLTK
Hardcoded old dependency versions that may cause compatibility issues with modern Python environments
correction_candidates: Remove specific version constraints and use latest compatible versions
Specify Python 3.8+ requirement and remove tensorflow dependency
Use requirements.txt file instead of inline version specifications
errors.golden_answer: Remove specific version constraints and use latest compatible versions
